title: These Exotic Pics Of Bollywood Actresses' Beach Vacays Will Make You Want To Pack Your Bags! - Indiatimes.com
text:
Isha Sharma February 08, 2017 
If you are someone who loves beach vacations, wait till you see the photographs of some of our Bollywood Celebrities. Apart from focusing on fitness and shoots, our Bollywood divas love taking breaks and it looks like their first preferences have always been beaches! 
From Nargis Fakhri to PC, whenever they take some time off work, they laze around on the beaches. Have a look at their Instagram feed and the pictures will COMPEL you to book tickets for a beach vacation right away. Have a look! Happy wanderlust-ing. 1. Nargis Fakhri I wrote your name so I could watch it wash away. #2016 #lettingGo #2017 #hereWeGo A photo posted by Nargis Fakhri (@nargisfakhri) on Dec 27, 2016 at 4:28pm PST A photo posted by Nargis Fakhri (@nargisfakhri) on Oct 11, 2016 at 4:39pm PDT 2. Priyanka Chopra
